name: deus ex machina clone (alekai)
description:
Soundtrack:
https://www.zophar.net/music/spectrum/deus-ex-machina

Controls:
QA & VB for movement
Control+i or Control+u to move between screens if you don’t want to wait

Description:
A clone of the first couple screens in 1984 game Deus Ex Machina.

True to the original, the soundtrack has a separate audio tape that needs to be synced up for the game to make sense. Don’t start the game until you have the soundtrack ready because the countdown begins right away!
